header.title: Premium Car Rental in Albania
header.subtitle: Experience Albania in style with our carefully selected fleet. Whether you're exploring the Albanian Riviera or navigating the streets of Tirana, we have the perfect vehicle for your journey.

specialOffer.title: Extended Stay Special Offer
specialOffer.description: Experience luxury for longer and save more. Book any of our vehicles for 10 days or more and unlock exclusive benefits and substantial savings on your rental.
specialOffer.highlight: Save up to 25% on 10+ day rentals
specialOffer.includes: Includes complimentary premium insurance package, unlimited mileage, and priority customer support.

insurance.title: Full Insurance Coverage
insurance.description: Drive with peace of mind knowing you're fully covered with our comprehensive insurance package.

fleet.title: Premium Fleet
fleet.description: Choose from our carefully maintained collection of luxury and reliable vehicles.

price.title: Best Price Guarantee
price.description: We offer competitive rates and transparent pricing with no hidden fees.

rental.title: Flexible Rental Terms
rental.description: From short trips to extended stays, we accommodate your schedule with flexible rental periods.

locations.title: Convenient Locations
locations.description: Pick up and drop off your vehicle at locations across Albania's major cities and airports.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our dedicated customer service team is always ready to assist you whenever you need help.

john.text: Amazing service! The car was in perfect condition and the staff was incredibly helpful. Will definitely rent again!
john.name: John Smith

maria.text: Best car rental experience in Albania. The process was smooth and the prices were very competitive.
maria.name: Maria Garcia

david.text: Excellent fleet of cars and professional service. Made our trip to Albania unforgettable!
david.name: David Chen

footer.description: Experience luxury and comfort with our premium car rental service in Albania. We offer a wide range of vehicles to meet your travel needs.

errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

featured.title: Our Premium Selection
featured.description: Discover our handpicked collection of premium vehicles, each chosen to provide you with the perfect blend of comfort, style, and performance. From luxurious sedans to versatile SUVs, these vehicles represent the finest options in our fleet.
